iterative/datachain

AI data warehouse for transforming and analyzing unstructured files like images, audio, video, text, and PDFs

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • extracts and converts documents like PDFs, Word files, and emails into structured data for AI and data workflows
  • AI agents for data warehouse management
  • database for AI data, vectors, and deep learning workflows
  • Open-source platform for processing PDFs, images, and audio with AI
  • collaboration tool for building and managing high-quality AI datasets
  • Analyzes codebase structure and dependencies for AI context
  • Scans your AI-generated images, grabs all the metadata and workflow info, and lets you search, tag, and organize everything—handy for keeping track of your Stable Diffusion creations
  • Transform data, create visualizations with AI
  • AI assistant for capturing and organizing study materials
  • AI tool for chatting with and analyzing your data using natural language; works with files and databases, keeps data on your device
